tutorialModalDesc: Please take a moment to read through this short introduction. It's extremely important to pay attention to what we have to say, for your own security. Ignoring this step will highly increase your chances of getting phished.
notARecommendedWay: This is NOT a recommended way of creating a wallet. This information is sensitive, and these options should only be used in offline settings by experienced crypto users.
